snippet: SUSSMAN--Marvin, JD. The Yeshiva University family mourns the passing of our longtime friend Marvin Sussman, Esq., who served with distinction on the YU Planned Giving Committee for several decades. He was wise, humble and kind, often offering his services pro bono. He will be remembered with abiding gratitude. May his family be comforted among those who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Richard M. Joel, President, Yeshiva University Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3
